title: Video Claims ‘Beheaded’ Boy In Rajasthan Sacrificed. It’s Fake!
subtitle: Viral videos and photos of a procession carrying a ‘beheaded’ boy in Rajasthan for sacrifice is fake.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim: The appalling narrative that almost an entire village participated in a human sacrifice should itself have raised doubts. However, social media users who shared the above post failed to put any critical thought into the issue, and progressively the narrative used to share this post became more and more provocative. In an age where there’s an explosion of information, not only is self-analysis important but governments need to play an active role in introducing curriculums that help people deal with excess information.
